snippet: New Jersey authorities said Aakash Dalal, 19, was the instigator of two firebombings in which Anthony Graziano, also 19, faces charges including attempted murder.
abstract: Aakash Dalal is arrested in the January firebombing of two synagogues in northern New Jersey and charged with aggravated arson and bias intimidation; first man arrested, Anthony Graziano, faces charges that include attempted murder.
lead_paragraph: New Jersey authorities said Aakash Dalal, 19, was the instigator of two firebombings in which Anthony Graziano, also 19, faces charges including attempted murder.

headline.seo: 2nd Arrest in Attacks on N.J. Synagogues
